product_name: Acorn Kinley Moc Slippers - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: On days when cold weather starts to creep inside, keep your feet warm inside the Acorn Kinley Moc slippers. Flexible suede uppers and wool linings provide all-day comfort and breathable insulation. Soft, flexible suede leather uppers provide structure and support. Sheepskin wool linings insulate while staying breathable, great for cold or mild temperatures. EVA insoles provide cushioning and support. Lightweight, fabric-wrapped rubber outsoles are suited to indoor use. Closeout.
short_description: On days when cold weather starts to creep inside, keep your feet warm inside the Acorn Kinley Moc slippers. Flexible suede uppers and wool linings provide all-day comfort and breathable insulation.
